name: Vegan Lentil Salad with Apples and Carrot
author: Marianne
summary: This is a simple and healthy lentil salad that I love, especially in summer since it tastes great warm or cold. If you like it spicy, you can add a little bit of fresh jalapeno to the salad.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, or more to taste
1 teaspoon Dijon mustard, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Add enough water to cover by 1 inch
Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, until lentils are tender but not mushy, 15 to 20 minutes
Combine lentils, apples, carrot, chives, and parsley in a bowl
Stir together olive oil, vinegar, mustard, salt, and pepper in a cup and pour over lentil mixture
